item.title: Suggestions and Requests
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:479949”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=598185.msg4208363#msg4208363 date=1359233642]

what was the glitch?

Something about once staff had posted in the thread it made the thread public, and some of those threads were merely for discussions between the user and the staff team. I think that was it, it was something along the lines of threads being made public before they were approved anyway.

Had never actually experienced that glitch, and I used the board often., Weird…
[/quote]
He basically got it right, only they weren’t just visible just like that, you would’ve had to press on the “See unread posts since last visit” link, and they’d be there.[/quote]

Oh okay, I rarely used that.

Read full topic
